bug.author: hubcity
bug.description: There are some broken links in your documentation. These are mostly due to the facts that you changed the way that some files are named (multiagent to multi_agent) and some external websites have rearranged things. I will submit a pull request soon.

comments.comment: If the PR above is accepted there are still two broken links in doc/source/rllib-offline.rst that reference specific lines of code in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/blob/b8a9e3f1064c6f8d754884fd9c75e0b2f88df4d6>https://github.com/ray-project/ray/blob/b8a9e3f1064c6f8d754884fd9c75e0b2f88df4d6</denchmark-link> - a blob that no longer exists. I didn't know the proper way to fix it.
Thanks for this PR; sorry for taking so long to get around to it.
RE: missing reference, one fix would just be to remove it.
